overview: Anil K. Singhal co-founded NetScout in June of 1984, and is serving today as Chairman, President, and Chief Executive Officer of the company. Mr. Singhal has provided technical leadership for the company since its inception and is credited with numerous innovations in the field of network traffic monitoring and analysis. Under his direction the company has grown to be the market leader at over $250M in revenues in fiscal 2008, after acquiring its chief competitor Network General. In his current role Mr. Singhal is providing strategic leadership and vision, as well as setting operational priorities for the companyâ€™s management team. Mr. Singhal holds a BSEE from BITS, Pilani, India and an MS in Computer Science from the University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign.
